bham.leakiest

Class Estimate

  • java.lang.Object
    • bham.leakiest.Estimate

  • public class Estimate
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class of the APIs for estimating information leakage of a system.
    Version:
    1.4.5
    Author:
    Tom Chothia, Yusuke Kawamoto, Chris Novakovic

    • Method Detail

      • getCapacity

        public static double getCapacity(Observations obs)
        Calculates the channel capacity from given observations. If Blahut-Arimoto Algorithm did not terminate and error is not acceptable, this method returns -1.
        Parameters:
        obs - Observations
        Returns:
        Channel capacity

      • getCondMinEntropy

        Returns:

        public static double getCorrectedCapacity(Observations obs)

        Parameters:
        obs - Observations
        Returns:
        Corrected channel capacity

        public static double[] getInputDistYieldingCapacity(Observations obs)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Input distribution that gives the channel capacity

      • getUpperBoundForZeroLeakage

        public static double getUpperBoundForZeroLeakage(Observations obs)
        Calculates the upper bound for zero leakage from given observations. If the number of inputs is less than 1 or that of outputs is less than 1, then this method returns -1.
        Parameters:
        obs - Observations
        Returns:
        Upper bound for zero leakage

      • getVariance

        public static double getVariance(Observations obs)
        Calculates the variance of the estimated mutual information from given observations when the input distribution is also estimated from the sample.
        Parameters:
        obs - observations
        Returns:
        the variance of the estimated mutual information when the input distribution is also estimated from the sample

      • VarianceOfEstimatedMIUnderEstimatedPrior

        public static double VarianceOfEstimatedMIUnderEstimatedPrior(ProbDist pd,
                                                              Channel channel,
                                                              int sampleSize)
        Calculates the variance for an estimated non-zero mutual information estimate when the input distribution is also estimated from the sample.
        Parameters:
        pd - (prior) input probability distribution
        channel - channel
        sampleSize - sample size
        Returns:
        the variance for an estimated non-zero mutual information estimate when the input distribution is also estimated from the sample

        the variance for an estimated non-zero mutual information estimate when the input distribution is known
